title: Kemono Friends Live Stream Calendar
hamburgerDescription: This will toggle visual expansion status of the toolbar. Screen readers can always navigate to the toolbar regardless of its visual status.

description.scheduledLive: an upcoming live streaming by {{members}}, starts {{eta}}
description.ongoingLive: an ongoing live streaming by {{members}}, started {{eta}}
description.endedLive: an ended live streaming by {{members}}, started at {{time}}, was live for {{duration}}
description.video: a video by {{members}}, uploaded at {{time}}, is {{duration}} in length

emptyResultPost: Try changing search terms in the menu.
noMoreItemsGibberish: You are at the very beginning of the history of KF YouTube channels, whew!

about.title: About this site
about.introduction: This website collects videos and live streamings of official YouTube channels of Kemono Friends and Kemono Friends V Project and displays them in a single place.
about.aboutAccuracy: The live streaming schedules are retrieved at certain intervals, and they do not always reflect latest information. See each YouTube channel for the latest information.
about.disclaimer: The website is an unofficial site and thus, neither of Kemono Friends Project nor its affiliates, of course, shall be liable for the website in any way. For complaints and/or feature requests (esp. translation fixes ;), contact the operator via the {{ghRepository}} of the website or any other means.
about.rights: The contents displayed on the website, such as thumbnail images, are retrieved from the official YouTube channels of Kemono Friends and the contents belong to copyright holders of respective videos or live streamings.
about.appeal: Last of all, it's my pleasure if you support Kemono Friends and Kemono Friends V Project by subscribing to the YouTube channels, liking the linked live streamings, sending (super) chats, posting comments, following Twitter accounts of the streamers, et cetera!
about.licenseBody: For copyright notice of the website itself, including thirdparty software used by it, see {{copying}} file.
about.twitterDesc: Provides updates on streaming schedule and shares relevant Tweets from collabed streamers
about.gitHubDesc: Hosts the source code of the site

help.title: Keyboard shortcuts
help.kbdDigit: Show/hide N-th channel in the menu (N is a number)
help.kbdSDigit: Show only N-th channel in the menu (N is a number)
help.kbdS0: Clear all the filters (show all the channels and clear the search field)
